id: Fried Broccoli with Sun-Dried Tomatoes and Cashew Nuts

ins.1: Mix all ingredients together in a jar of sauce
ins.2: Cut broccoli into florets and sun dried tomatoes into quarters
ins.3: Fry cashew nuts in a frying pan and remove
ins.4: Heat sesame oil in a pan and add plenty of broccoli and sear by stirring for 3 minutes
ins.5: Mix in the sun dried tomatoes, cashew nuts and sauce and sauté all for 2 minutes while stirring well
